00041 subroutine read_xml_type_settings_xml_array( &
00042       info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00043       dvar, has_dvar )
00044    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info

00046    logical, intent(inout)                          :: endtag

00048    integer, intent(inout)                          :: noattribs

00052    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_dvar

00058    allocate( newvar(1:newsize) )
00059    newvar(1:newsize-1) = dvar
00060    deallocate( dvar )

00062

00064               dvar(newsize), has_dvar )
00065 end subroutine read_xml_type_settings_xml_array
00066 
00067 subroutine read_xml_type_settings_xml( info, starttag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00068               dvar, has_dvar )
00069    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00070    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: starttag
00071    logical, intent(inout)                          :: endtag
00072    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: attribs
00073    integer, intent(inout)                          :: noattribs
00074    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout)   :: data
00075    integer, intent(inout)                          :: nodata
00076    type(settings_xml), intent(inout)  :: dvar
00077    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_dvar
00078 
00079    integer                                      :: att_
00080    integer                                      :: noatt_
00081    logical                                      :: error
00082    logical                                      :: endtag_org
00083    character(len=len(starttag))                 :: tag
00084    logical                                         :: has_histories
00085    logical                                         :: has_seed
00086    logical                                         :: has_source_type
00087    logical                                         :: has_source_path
00088    has_histories                        = .false.
00089    has_seed                             = .false.
00090    has_source_type                      = .false.
00091    has_source_path                      = .false.
00092    call init_xml_type_settings_xml(dvar)
00093    has_dvar = .true.
00094    error  = .false.
00095    att_   = 0
00096    noatt_ = noattribs+1
00097    endtag_org = endtag
00098    do
00099       if ( nodata /= 0 ) then
00100          noattribs = 0
00101          tag = starttag
00102       elseif ( att_ < noatt_ .and. noatt_ > 1 ) then
00103          att_      = att_ + 1
00104          if ( att_ <= noatt_-1 ) then
00105             tag       = attribs(1,att_)
00106             data(1)   = attribs(2,att_)
00107             noattribs = 0
00108             nodata    = 1
00109             endtag    = .false.
00110          else
00111             tag       = starttag
00112             noattribs = 0
00113             nodata    = 0
00114             endtag    = .true.
00115             cycle
00116          endif
00117       else
00118          if ( endtag_org ) then
00119             return
00120          else
00121             call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
00122             if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00123                write(lurep_,*) 'Error reading input file!'
00124                error = .true.
00125                return
00126             endif
00127          endif
00128       endif
00129       if ( endtag .and. tag == starttag ) then
00130          exit
00131       endif
00132       if ( endtag .and. noattribs == 0 ) then
00133          if ( xml_ok(info) ) then
00134             cycle
00135          else
00136             exit
00137          endif
00138       endif
00139       select case( tag )
00140       case('histories')
00141          call read_xml_integer( &
00142             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00143             dvar%histories, has_histories )
00144       case('seed')
00145          call read_xml_integer( &
00146             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00147             dvar%seed, has_seed )
00148       case('source_type')
00149          call read_xml_integer( &
00150             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00151             dvar%source_type, has_source_type )
00152       case('source_path')
00153          call read_xml_word( &
00154             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00155             dvar%source_path, has_source_path )
00156       case ('comment', '!--')
00157          ! Simply ignore
00158       case default
00159          if ( strict_ ) then
00160             error = .true.
00161             call xml_report_errors( info, &
00162                'Unknown or wrongly placed tag: ' // trim(tag))
00163          endif
00164       end select
00165       nodata = 0
00166       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) exit
00167    end do
00168    if ( .not. has_histories ) then
00169       has_dvar = .false.
00170       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on histories')
00171    endif
00172    if ( .not. has_seed ) then
00173       has_dvar = .false.
00174       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on seed')
00175    endif
00176    if ( .not. has_source_type ) then
00177       has_dvar = .false.
00178       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on source_type')
00179    endif
00180    if ( .not. has_source_path ) then
00181       has_dvar = .false.
00182       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on source_path')
00183    endif
00184 end subroutine read_xml_type_settings_xml
00185 subroutine init_xml_type_settings_xml_array( dvar )
00186    type(settings_xml), dimension(:), pointer :: dvar
00187    if ( associated( dvar ) ) then
00188       deallocate( dvar )
00189    endif
00190    allocate( dvar(0) )
00191 end subroutine init_xml_type_settings_xml_array
00192 subroutine init_xml_type_settings_xml(dvar)
00193    type(settings_xml) :: dvar
00194 end subroutine init_xml_type_settings_xml
00195 subroutine write_xml_type_settings_xml_array( &
00196       info, tag, indent, dvar )
00197    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00198    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: tag
00199    integer                                         :: indent
00200    type(settings_xml), dimension(:)        :: dvar
00201    integer                                         :: i
00202    do i = 1,size(dvar)
00203        call write_xml_type_settings_xml( info, tag, indent, dvar(i) )
00204    enddo
00205 end subroutine write_xml_type_settings_xml_array
00206 
00207 subroutine write_xml_type_settings_xml( &
00208       info, tag, indent, dvar )
00209    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00210    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: tag
00211    integer                                         :: indent
00212    type(settings_xml)                      :: dvar
00213    character(len=100)                              :: indentation
00214    indentation = ' '
00215    write(info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)),&
00216        '<',trim(tag), '>'
00217    call write_to_xml_integer( info, 'histories', indent+3, dvar%histories)
00218    call write_to_xml_integer( info, 'seed', indent+3, dvar%seed)
00219    call write_to_xml_integer( info, 'source_type', indent+3, dvar%source_type)
00220    call write_to_xml_word( info, 'source_path', indent+3, dvar%source_path)
00221    write(info%lun,'(4a)') indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00222        '</' //trim(tag) // '>'
00223 end subroutine write_xml_type_settings_xml

00251 subroutine read_xml_type_nuclide_xml( info, starttag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00252               dvar, has_dvar )
00253    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00254    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: starttag
00255    logical, intent(inout)                          :: endtag
00256    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: attribs
00257    integer, intent(inout)                          :: noattribs
00258    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout)   :: data
00259    integer, intent(inout)                          :: nodata
00260    type(nuclide_xml), intent(inout)  :: dvar
00261    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_dvar
00262 
00263    integer                                      :: att_
00264    integer                                      :: noatt_
00265    logical                                      :: error
00266    logical                                      :: endtag_org
00267    character(len=len(starttag))                 :: tag
00268    logical                                         :: has_N
00269    logical                                         :: has_A
00270    logical                                         :: has_path
00271    logical                                         :: has_thermal
00272    has_N                                = .false.
00273    has_A                                = .false.
00274    has_path                             = .false.
00275    has_thermal                          = .false.
00276    call init_xml_type_nuclide_xml(dvar)
00277    has_dvar = .true.
00278    error  = .false.
00279    att_   = 0
00280    noatt_ = noattribs+1
00281    endtag_org = endtag
00282    do
00283       if ( nodata /= 0 ) then
00284          noattribs = 0
00285          tag = starttag
00286       elseif ( att_ < noatt_ .and. noatt_ > 1 ) then
00287          att_      = att_ + 1
00288          if ( att_ <= noatt_-1 ) then
00289             tag       = attribs(1,att_)
00290             data(1)   = attribs(2,att_)
00291             noattribs = 0
00292             nodata    = 1
00293             endtag    = .false.
00294          else
00295             tag       = starttag
00296             noattribs = 0
00297             nodata    = 0
00298             endtag    = .true.
00299             cycle
00300          endif
00301       else
00302          if ( endtag_org ) then
00303             return
00304          else
00305             call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
00306             if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00307                write(lurep_,*) 'Error reading input file!'
00308                error = .true.
00309                return
00310             endif
00311          endif
00312       endif
00313       if ( endtag .and. tag == starttag ) then
00314          exit
00315       endif
00316       if ( endtag .and. noattribs == 0 ) then
00317          if ( xml_ok(info) ) then
00318             cycle
00319          else
00320             exit
00321          endif
00322       endif
00323       select case( tag )
00324       case('N')
00325          call read_xml_double( &
00326             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00327             dvar%N, has_N )
00328       case('A')
00329          call read_xml_double( &
00330             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00331             dvar%A, has_A )
00332       case('path')
00333          call read_xml_word( &
00334             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00335             dvar%path, has_path )
00336       case('thermal')
00337          call read_xml_logical( &
00338             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00339             dvar%thermal, has_thermal )
00340       case ('comment', '!--')
00341          ! Simply ignore
00342       case default
00343          if ( strict_ ) then
00344             error = .true.
00345             call xml_report_errors( info, &
00346                'Unknown or wrongly placed tag: ' // trim(tag))
00347          endif
00348       end select
00349       nodata = 0
00350       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) exit
00351    end do
00352    if ( .not. has_N ) then
00353       has_dvar = .false.
00354       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on N')
00355    endif
00356    if ( .not. has_A ) then
00357       has_dvar = .false.
00358       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on A')
00359    endif
00360    if ( .not. has_path ) then
00361       has_dvar = .false.
00362       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on path')
00363    endif
00364    if ( .not. has_thermal ) then
00365       has_dvar = .false.
00366       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on thermal')
00367    endif

00391 subroutine write_xml_type_nuclide_xml( &

00435 subroutine read_xml_type_material_xml( info, starttag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00436               dvar, has_dvar )
00437    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00438    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: starttag
00439    logical, intent(inout)                          :: endtag
00440    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: attribs
00441    integer, intent(inout)                          :: noattribs
00442    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout)   :: data
00443    integer, intent(inout)                          :: nodata
00444    type(material_xml), intent(inout)  :: dvar
00445    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_dvar
00446 
00447    integer                                      :: att_
00448    integer                                      :: noatt_
00449    logical                                      :: error
00450    logical                                      :: endtag_org
00451    character(len=len(starttag))                 :: tag
00452    logical                                         :: has_nuclides
00453    has_nuclides                         = .false.
00454    allocate(dvar%nuclides(0))
00455    call init_xml_type_material_xml(dvar)
00456    has_dvar = .true.
00457    error  = .false.
00458    att_   = 0
00459    noatt_ = noattribs+1
00460    endtag_org = endtag
00461    do
00462       if ( nodata /= 0 ) then
00463          noattribs = 0
00464          tag = starttag
00465       elseif ( att_ < noatt_ .and. noatt_ > 1 ) then
00466          att_      = att_ + 1
00467          if ( att_ <= noatt_-1 ) then
00468             tag       = attribs(1,att_)
00469             data(1)   = attribs(2,att_)
00470             noattribs = 0
00471             nodata    = 1
00472             endtag    = .false.
00473          else
00474             tag       = starttag
00475             noattribs = 0
00476             nodata    = 0
00477             endtag    = .true.
00478             cycle
00479          endif
00480       else
00481          if ( endtag_org ) then
00482             return
00483          else
00484             call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
00485             if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00486                write(lurep_,*) 'Error reading input file!'
00487                error = .true.
00488                return
00489             endif
00490          endif
00491       endif
00492       if ( endtag .and. tag == starttag ) then
00493          exit
00494       endif
00495       if ( endtag .and. noattribs == 0 ) then
00496          if ( xml_ok(info) ) then
00497             cycle
00498          else
00499             exit
00500          endif
00501       endif
00502       select case( tag )
00503       case('nuclide')
00504          call read_xml_type_nuclide_xml_array( &
00505             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00506             dvar%nuclides, has_nuclides )
00507       case ('comment', '!--')
00508          ! Simply ignore
00509       case default
00510          if ( strict_ ) then
00511             error = .true.
00512             call xml_report_errors( info, &
00513                'Unknown or wrongly placed tag: ' // trim(tag))
00514          endif
00515       end select
00516       nodata = 0
00517       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) exit
00518    end do
00519    if ( .not. has_nuclides ) then
00520       has_dvar = .false.
00521       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on nuclides')
00522    endif
00523 end subroutine read_xml_type_material_xml
00524 subroutine init_xml_type_material_xml_array( dvar )

00526    if ( associated( dvar ) ) then
00527       deallocate( dvar )
00528    endif
00529    allocate( dvar(0) )

00531 subroutine init_xml_type_material_xml(dvar)

00538    integer                                         :: indent

00546 subroutine write_xml_type_material_xml( &

00561 subroutine read_xml_type_tally_xml_array( &
00562       info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00563       dvar, has_dvar )
00564    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00565    character(len=*), intent(inout)                 :: tag
00566    logical, intent(inout)                          :: endtag
00567    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: attribs
00568    integer, intent(inout)                          :: noattribs
00569    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout)   :: data
00570    integer, intent(inout)                          :: nodata
00571    type(tally_xml), dimension(:), pointer :: dvar
00572    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_dvar
00573 
00574    integer                                      :: newsize
00575    type(tally_xml), dimension(:), pointer :: newvar
00576 
00577    newsize = size(dvar) + 1
00578    allocate( newvar(1:newsize) )
00579    newvar(1:newsize-1) = dvar
00580    deallocate( dvar )
00581    dvar => newvar
00582 
00583    call read_xml_type_tally_xml( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00584               dvar(newsize), has_dvar )
00585 end subroutine read_xml_type_tally_xml_array
00586 
00587 subroutine read_xml_type_tally_xml( info, starttag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00588               dvar, has_dvar )
00589    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00590    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: starttag
00591    logical, intent(inout)                          :: endtag
00592    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: attribs
00593    integer, intent(inout)                          :: noattribs
00594    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout)   :: data
00595    integer, intent(inout)                          :: nodata
00596    type(tally_xml), intent(inout)  :: dvar
00597    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_dvar
00598 
00599    integer                                      :: att_
00600    integer                                      :: noatt_
00601    logical                                      :: error
00602    logical                                      :: endtag_org
00603    character(len=len(starttag))                 :: tag
00604    logical                                         :: has_Ebins
00605    logical                                         :: has_type
00606    logical                                         :: has_isotope
00607    has_Ebins                            = .false.
00608    has_type                             = .false.
00609    has_isotope                          = .false.
00610    call init_xml_type_tally_xml(dvar)
00611    has_dvar = .true.
00612    error  = .false.
00613    att_   = 0
00614    noatt_ = noattribs+1
00615    endtag_org = endtag
00616    do
00617       if ( nodata /= 0 ) then
00618          noattribs = 0
00619          tag = starttag
00620       elseif ( att_ < noatt_ .and. noatt_ > 1 ) then
00621          att_      = att_ + 1
00622          if ( att_ <= noatt_-1 ) then
00623             tag       = attribs(1,att_)
00624             data(1)   = attribs(2,att_)
00625             noattribs = 0
00626             nodata    = 1
00627             endtag    = .false.
00628          else
00629             tag       = starttag
00630             noattribs = 0
00631             nodata    = 0
00632             endtag    = .true.
00633             cycle
00634          endif
00635       else
00636          if ( endtag_org ) then
00637             return
00638          else
00639             call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
00640             if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00641                write(lurep_,*) 'Error reading input file!'
00642                error = .true.
00643                return
00644             endif
00645          endif
00646       endif
00647       if ( endtag .and. tag == starttag ) then
00648          exit
00649       endif
00650       if ( endtag .and. noattribs == 0 ) then
00651          if ( xml_ok(info) ) then
00652             cycle
00653          else
00654             exit
00655          endif
00656       endif
00657       select case( tag )
00658       case('Ebins')
00659          call read_xml_double_array( &
00660             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00661             dvar%Ebins, has_Ebins )
00662       case('type')
00663          call read_xml_word( &
00664             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00665             dvar%type, has_type )
00666       case('isotope')
00667          call read_xml_integer( &
00668             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00669             dvar%isotope, has_isotope )
00670       case ('comment', '!--')
00671          ! Simply ignore
00672       case default
00673          if ( strict_ ) then
00674             error = .true.
00675             call xml_report_errors( info, &
00676                'Unknown or wrongly placed tag: ' // trim(tag))
00677          endif
00678       end select
00679       nodata = 0
00680       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) exit
00681    end do
00682    if ( .not. has_Ebins ) then
00683       has_dvar = .false.
00684       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on Ebins')
00685    endif
00686    if ( .not. has_type ) then
00687       has_dvar = .false.
00688       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on type')
00689    endif
00690    if ( .not. has_isotope ) then
00691       has_dvar = .false.
00692       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on isotope')
00693    endif
00694 end subroutine read_xml_type_tally_xml
00695 subroutine init_xml_type_tally_xml_array( dvar )
00696    type(tally_xml), dimension(:), pointer :: dvar
00697    if ( associated( dvar ) ) then
00698       deallocate( dvar )
00699    endif
00700    allocate( dvar(0) )
00701 end subroutine init_xml_type_tally_xml_array
00702 subroutine init_xml_type_tally_xml(dvar)
00703    type(tally_xml) :: dvar
00704 end subroutine init_xml_type_tally_xml
00705 subroutine write_xml_type_tally_xml_array( &
00706       info, tag, indent, dvar )
00707    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00708    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: tag
00709    integer                                         :: indent
00710    type(tally_xml), dimension(:)        :: dvar
00711    integer                                         :: i
00712    do i = 1,size(dvar)
00713        call write_xml_type_tally_xml( info, tag, indent, dvar(i) )
00714    enddo
00715 end subroutine write_xml_type_tally_xml_array
00716 
00717 subroutine write_xml_type_tally_xml( &
00718       info, tag, indent, dvar )
00719    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00720    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: tag
00721    integer                                         :: indent
00722    type(tally_xml)                      :: dvar
00723    character(len=100)                              :: indentation
00724    indentation = ' '
00725    write(info%lun, '(4a)' ) indentation(1:min(indent,100)),&
00726        '<',trim(tag), '>'
00727    call write_to_xml_double_array( info, 'Ebins', indent+3, dvar%Ebins)
00728    call write_to_xml_word( info, 'type', indent+3, dvar%type)
00729    call write_to_xml_integer( info, 'isotope', indent+3, dvar%isotope)
00730    write(info%lun,'(4a)') indentation(1:min(indent,100)), &
00731        '</' //trim(tag) // '>'
00732 end subroutine write_xml_type_tally_xml

00760 subroutine read_xml_type_tallies_xml( info, starttag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00761               dvar, has_dvar )
00762    type(XML_PARSE)                                 :: info
00763    character(len=*), intent(in)                    :: starttag
00764    logical, intent(inout)                          :: endtag
00765    character(len=*), dimension(:,:), intent(inout) :: attribs
00766    integer, intent(inout)                          :: noattribs
00767    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout)   :: data
00768    integer, intent(inout)                          :: nodata
00769    type(tallies_xml), intent(inout)  :: dvar
00770    logical, intent(inout)                       :: has_dvar
00771 
00772    integer                                      :: att_
00773    integer                                      :: noatt_
00774    logical                                      :: error
00775    logical                                      :: endtag_org
00776    character(len=len(starttag))                 :: tag
00777    logical                                         :: has_tally
00778    has_tally                            = .false.
00779    allocate(dvar%tally(0))
00780    call init_xml_type_tallies_xml(dvar)
00781    has_dvar = .true.
00782    error  = .false.
00783    att_   = 0
00784    noatt_ = noattribs+1
00785    endtag_org = endtag
00786    do
00787       if ( nodata /= 0 ) then
00788          noattribs = 0
00789          tag = starttag
00790       elseif ( att_ < noatt_ .and. noatt_ > 1 ) then
00791          att_      = att_ + 1
00792          if ( att_ <= noatt_-1 ) then
00793             tag       = attribs(1,att_)
00794             data(1)   = attribs(2,att_)
00795             noattribs = 0
00796             nodata    = 1
00797             endtag    = .false.
00798          else
00799             tag       = starttag
00800             noattribs = 0
00801             nodata    = 0
00802             endtag    = .true.
00803             cycle
00804          endif
00805       else
00806          if ( endtag_org ) then
00807             return
00808          else
00809             call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
00810             if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00811                write(lurep_,*) 'Error reading input file!'
00812                error = .true.
00813                return
00814             endif
00815          endif
00816       endif
00817       if ( endtag .and. tag == starttag ) then
00818          exit
00819       endif
00820       if ( endtag .and. noattribs == 0 ) then
00821          if ( xml_ok(info) ) then
00822             cycle
00823          else
00824             exit
00825          endif
00826       endif
00827       select case( tag )
00828       case('tally')
00829          call read_xml_type_tally_xml_array( &
00830             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00831             dvar%tally, has_tally )
00832       case ('comment', '!--')
00833          ! Simply ignore
00834       case default
00835          if ( strict_ ) then
00836             error = .true.
00837             call xml_report_errors( info, &
00838                'Unknown or wrongly placed tag: ' // trim(tag))
00839          endif
00840       end select
00841       nodata = 0
00842       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) exit
00843    end do
00844    if ( .not. has_tally ) then
00845       has_dvar = .false.
00846       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on tally')
00847    endif
00848 end subroutine read_xml_type_tallies_xml
00849 subroutine init_xml_type_tallies_xml_array( dvar )
00850    type(tallies_xml), dimension(:), pointer :: dvar

00852       deallocate( dvar )
00853    endif
00854    allocate( dvar(0) )
00855 end subroutine init_xml_type_tallies_xml_array
00856 subroutine init_xml_type_tallies_xml(dvar)

00886 subroutine read_xml_file_input_t(fname, lurep, errout)
00887    character(len=*), intent(in)           :: fname
00888    integer, intent(in), optional          :: lurep
00889    logical, intent(out), optional         :: errout
00890 
00891    type(XML_PARSE)                        :: info
00892    logical                                :: error
00893    character(len=80)                      :: tag
00894    character(len=80)                      :: starttag
00895    logical                                :: endtag
00896    character(len=80), dimension(1:2,1:20) :: attribs
00897    integer                                :: noattribs
00898    character(len=100000), dimension(1:1000)  :: data
00899    integer                                :: nodata
00900    logical                                         :: has_settings_
00901    logical                                         :: has_material_
00902    logical                                         :: has_tallies_
00903    has_settings_                        = .false.
00904    has_material_                        = .false.
00905    allocate(material_(0))
00906    has_tallies_                         = .false.
00907 
00908    call init_xml_file_input_t
00909    call xml_open( info, fname, .true. )
00910    call xml_options( info, report_errors=.false., ignore_whitespace=.true.)
00911    lurep_ = 0
00912    if ( present(lurep) ) then
00913       lurep_ = lurep
00914       call xml_options( info, report_lun=lurep )
00915    endif
00916    do
00917       call xml_get( info, starttag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, &
00918          data, nodata)
00919       if ( starttag /= '!--' ) exit
00920    enddo
00921    if ( starttag /= "input" ) then
00922       call xml_report_errors( info, &
00923          'XML-file should have root element "input"')
00924       error = .true.
00925       call xml_close(info)
00926       return
00927    endif
00928    strict_ = .false.
00929    error = .false.
00930    do
00931       call xml_get( info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata )
00932       if ( xml_error(info) ) then
00933          write(lurep_,*) 'Error reading input file!'
00934          error = .true.
00935          return
00936       endif
00937       if ( endtag .and. tag == starttag ) then
00938          exit
00939       endif
00940       if ( endtag .and. noattribs == 0 ) then
00941          if ( xml_ok(info) ) then
00942             cycle
00943          else
00944             exit
00945          endif
00946       endif
00947       select case( tag )
00948       case('settings')
00949          call read_xml_type_settings_xml( &
00950             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00951             settings_, has_settings_ )
00952       case('material')
00953          call read_xml_type_material_xml_array( &
00954             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00955             material_, has_material_ )
00956       case('tallies')
00957          call read_xml_type_tallies_xml( &
00958             info, tag, endtag, attribs, noattribs, data, nodata, &
00959             tallies_, has_tallies_ )
00960       case ('comment', '!--')
00961          ! Simply ignore
00962       case default
00963          if ( strict_ ) then
00964             error = .true.
00965             call xml_report_errors( info, &
00966                'Unknown or wrongly placed tag: ' // trim(tag))
00967          endif
00968       end select
00969       nodata = 0
00970       if ( .not. xml_ok(info) ) exit
00971    end do
00972    if ( .not. has_settings_ ) then
00973       error = .true.
00974       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on settings_')
00975    endif
00976    if ( .not. has_material_ ) then
00977       error = .true.
00978       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on material_')
00979    endif
00980    if ( .not. has_tallies_ ) then
00981       error = .true.
00982       call xml_report_errors(info, 'Missing data on tallies_')
00983    endif
00984    if ( present(errout) ) errout = error
00985    call xml_close(info)
00986 end subroutine
00987 
00988 subroutine write_xml_file_input_t(fname, lurep)
00989    character(len=*), intent(in)           :: fname
00990    integer, intent(in), optional          :: lurep
00991 
00992    type(XML_PARSE)                        :: info
00993    integer                                :: indent = 0
00994 
00995    call xml_open( info, fname, .false. )
00996    call xml_options( info, report_errors=.true.)
00997    if ( present(lurep) ) then
00998        call xml_options( info, report_errors=.true.)
00999    endif
01000    write(info%lun,'(a)') &
01001       '<input>'
01002    call write_xml_type_settings_xml( info, 'settings', indent+3, settings_)
01003    call write_xml_type_material_xml_array( info, 'material', indent+3, material_)
01004    call write_xml_type_tallies_xml( info, 'tallies', indent+3, tallies_)
01005    write(info%lun,'(a)') '</input>'
01006    call xml_close(info)
01007 end subroutine
01008 
01009 subroutine init_xml_file_input_t
01010 
01011 end subroutine
01012 
01013 end module
